name: Betでござる！-タイムスリップ系超爽快ギャンブルゲーム
name_original: Betでござる！-タイムスリップ系超爽快ギャンブルゲーム
description:
One day Tokio finds him self surrounded by things he had never seen before.
It was Edo period, which was a period of Samurais, and all the people wore kimono.

He has only one choice to go back.
That is to build a "Time Machine”!

However there is one big problem he has to overcome.
He acquires a blueprint, but he cannot afford for all the machines needed for it.

Will he be able to complete his mission, to go back to his family!?
Guide Tokio to overcome many difficulties in Edo Period and find out yourself!
